content: Audit current dashboard navigation and tab structure
Research and compare UI libraries (MUI vs shadcn vs Mantine)
Install and setup Mantine UI for better performance and trading components
Create Farms tab for agent grouping and visualization
Reorganize navigation: Overview > Agents > Farms > Goals > Trading > Portfolio > Analytics > Risk
Implement persistent state management system using Zustand
Connect real wallet functionality with $50 loading capability
Make agents fully autonomous and trading with real funds
Implement cross-tab data persistence and real-time updates
Integrate MCP protocol for all trading operations
Test complete workflow: Wallet > Agents > Farms > Trading
